questions: Who  doesn't  like  the  soup  for  lunch ?.
article: Mike  and  his  father  are  sitting   at   the  table . They are having their lunch. " I  don't  like  this  soup  .  I  don't  want  to  have  it" ,  says  Mike .  After  lunch ,  Mike  and  his  father  work  on  the  farm .  They work hard. In  the  evening ,  Mike's  father  gives  him  a  bowl  of  soup . "Oh, this soup is nice ", says Mike.  His mother says: "It's the same soup."
